option(GODOT_BUILTIN_BROTLI "Use the built-in Brotli library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_CERTS "Use the built-in SSL certificates bundles." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_CLIPPER2 "Use the built-in Clipper2 library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_EMBREE "Use the built-in Embree library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_ENET "Use the built-in ENet library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_FREETYPE "Use the built-in FreeType library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_MSDFGEN "Use the built-in MSDFgen library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_GLSLANG "Use the built-in glslang library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_GRAPHITE "Use the built-in Graphite library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_HARFBUZZ "Use the built-in HarfBuzz library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_ICU4C "Use the built-in ICU library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_LIBOGG "Use the built-in libogg library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_LIBPNG "Use the built-in libpng library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_LIBTHEORA "Use the built-in libtheora library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_LIBVORBIS "Use the built-in libvorbis library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_LIBWEBP "Use the built-in libwebp library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_WSLAY "Use the built-in wslay library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_MBEDTLS "Use the built-in mbedTLS library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_MINIUPNPC "Use the built-in miniupnpc library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_OPENXR "Use the built-in OpenXR library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_PCRE2 "Use the built-in PCRE2 library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_PCRE2_WITH_JIT "Use JIT compiler for the built-in PCRE2 library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_RECASTNAVIGATION "Use the built-in Recast navigation library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_RVO2_2D "Use the built-in RVO2 2D library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_RVO2_3D "Use the built-in RVO2 3D library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_SQUISH "Use the built-in squish library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_XATLAS "Use the built-in xatlas library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_ZLIB "Use the built-in zlib library." ON)
option(GODOT_BUILTIN_ZSTD "Use the built-in Zstd library." ON)

add_subdirectory(misc)
add_subdirectory(mbedtls)
add_subdirectory(zstd)
